description: This file contains implementation of functions for managing TCP socket connections within the Ansc Lpcco Tcp Object, including initialization, cleanup, handling acceptance, removal, querying, processing, notification, and completion of send operations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpBwoInit(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the TCP object; currently a placeholder that always returns success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpBwoUnload(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Unloads or cleans up the TCP object; currently a placeholder that always returns success.

methods.name: BOOL AnscLpccoTcpBwoAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PANSC_HANDLE phClientContext)
methods.description: Handles new incoming TCP connection acceptances by allocating buffer descriptors and setting buffer context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpBwoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Removes a TCP connection, frees buffer descriptors, manages party address state, and restarts connection timer if needed.

methods.name: ULONG AnscLpccoTcpBwoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes incoming data buffers, handling TCP message boundaries, buffer accumulation, and invoking receive handlers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpBwoProcessSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Stub for synchronous processing, currently not applicable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpBwoProcessAsync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Stub for asynchronous processing, currently not applicable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpBwoSendComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved,ANSC_STATUS status)
methods.description: Handles completion of data send operations; currently a placeholder returning success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpBwoNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ULONG ulEvent,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles socket events such as error, close, resource availability, and timeout.
